name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Keith Mason KNIGHT, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Keith Mason KNIGHT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kenneth Lee Rotz, Gettysburg, for appellant.
Roy A. Keefer, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
450 A.2d 970
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Keith Mason KNIGHT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 17, 1982.
Decided Oct. 4, 1982.
Kenneth Lee Rotz, Gettysburg, for appellant.
Roy A. Keefer, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
